mil7.4.2:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘āpassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.4.2:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kuhanalapananemittakanippesikataṃ apanetvā susaṇṭhitamakampitamaluḷitasabhāvaparisuddhācārena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.2:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, āpassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.2:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattesu khantimettānuddayasampannena hitesinā anukampakena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.2:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, āpassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.2:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, āpo asuciṃ suciṃ karoti;
mil7.4.2:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena gāme vā araññe vā upajjhāye upajjhāyamattesu ācariye ācariyamattesu sabbattha anadhikaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ anavasesakārinā.
mil7.4.2:7.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, āpassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.2:8.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena appicchasantuṭṭhapavivittapaṭisallānena satataṃ sabbalokamabhipatthitena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.2:8.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, āpassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.2:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, āpo na kassaci ahitamupadahati;
mil7.4.2:9.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena parabhaṇḍanakalahaviggahavivādarittajjhānaaratijananaṃ kāyavacīcittehi pāpakaṃ na karaṇīyaṃ.
mil7.4.2:9.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, āpassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
